original_text: The people may accept you well when you go into a town. Then eat the food that those people give to you.
korean_text: 어느 동네에 들어가든지 너희를 영접하거든 너희 앞에 차려놓는 것을 먹고

sentences.original_text: The people may accept you well
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 당신을 잘 받아들일 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: when you go into a town
that those people give to you
